QuestData.Title: Arelion's Mistress
QuestData.Description: With all the important matters at hand Arelion still found time in his schedule to see a mistress!$B$BIt's all becoming perfectly clear. Viera Sunwhisper, that filthy wench... we'll show her to never cross a magistrix again.$B$BTake this scroll and find Viera. Find a way to lure her away from town and use the scroll on her.$B$BArelion mentioned she couldn't resist a particular wine harvested by the cenarion druids. You might find some at Cenarion Refuge, just inside Zangarmarsh, west of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Magistrix Carinda at Falcon Watch wants you to lure Viera Sunwhisper away from the settlement and then use Carinda's Scroll of Retribution on her.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent! That little backstabber won't be running off with anyone's husband any time soon.$B$BHere's a little something for your troubles. I trust we can keep this incident between us, $N.
